name: Thule Chariot Lock Kit - Lite/Cross
description: Make sure your bike trailer doesn’t “walk-away” while you are doing your shopping. This lock kit locks your Thule Chariot trailer to your bike’s hitch mount.Uses Thule’s one-key system.Works with Thule Chariot Sport, Thule Chariot Cross, Thule Chariot Cab and Thule Chariot Lite.
